response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs and aspirations. This remarkable item carries a significant value to me, reflecting its unique qualities and the effort invested in its creation. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at a price of $1,200,000. I am confident this price reflects the true worth of the product while also providing you with a valuable addition to your collection or endeavors. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to discuss this offer in more detail. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
